links.title: Models for diversity in Direct Link
Alternatives for your Direct Link Connect deployment

section_highlights.title: Announcement: SSL VPN endpoints
section_highlights.description: On 2024 March 13, the following SSL VPN endpoints were removed from service. This change is part of our ongoing efforts to optimize our network infrastructure and improve service quality. A full, updated list of available SSL VPN endpoints is located at Available VPN endpoints.

tiles.title: Deprecation of IPsec VPN
tiles.description: As of 3 November 2024, you can't create new instances of IPsec VPN. Existing IPsec VPN instances are supported until 27 June 2025. Any instances that still exist on that date will be deleted.
